author: bcurtis
msg: Add properties to DroidGap that can be set when the intent/activity is called.  This enables the developer to show app loading dialog,  splashscreen, or set other properties.

author: bcurtis
msg: Use polling if PhoneGap app is loaded from server, since XHR doesn't work to localhost due to cross-domain security policy.

author: matt@clevr.ltd.uk
msg: Adds localStorage support to older versions

author: macdonst
msg: Fixing issue with addEventListener and Sencha
